Pre-Game Insights: The Phillies are 40-39 on the road this season, while the Nationals are 37-42 at home.
Philadelphia has had some struggles on the road this season, but they will start Zach Wheeler, who has been one of the best pitchers in baseball over the last few weeks.
Washington will go with MacKenzie Gore, who has pitched very well recently, but still has an elevated WHIP.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Each of the Nationals' last five day games against National League opponents have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Six of the Phillies' last seven day games against National League opponents have gone OVER the total runs line.
The 'Inning 1 OVER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Phillies' last seven games as road favorites against NL East opponents.
